name: Toyota
description: Toyota, a leading automaker, is known for its reliable and fuel-efficient vehicles.

name: Ford
description: Ford has a rich history of producing innovative cars, trucks, and SUVs.

name: Mahindra

name: Honda
description: Honda is known for its well-engineered cars and motorcycles with a focus on performance and efficiency.

name: BMW

name: Mercedes-Benz
